name: AlphaBrat
description: AlphaBrat is modeled after the 1024 and 2048 games, although it works a little differently to accommodate the greater span of 26 alphabet characters.  Use arrow keys or buttons to move letters left, up, down and  right. When letters collide, two A's become a B, two B's become a C, and so on. Each move will add a new letter to the grid, if possible. You win when two Y's become a Z. But the true, AlphaBrat Ninja will press on until all squares are filled with the letter Z. Yes, it can be done. Click the restart button to restart game.
